page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: Obviously the main industry in this area is{farming,}both arable and animal. The{sewage works}were opened in the 1900's. Today they are working to make it into a{pumping station. They are draining the land so they can lay new pipes to Norton as well as Askern, Moss and Fenwick. They will store the sewage in a big tank before pumping it to Norton. In the olden days the{brickworks}produced bricks for the surrounding area. The brickworks were opened in the 18th century and closed down in the 1920's. You can still see the bricks in most of the houses of Moss and Fenwick. The quarry is a{lake}now. They have competitions to see who catches the most fish. You can see the{chimmey from miles around dominating the surrounding area.
